eventDecorators.name: onPurchase
eventDecorators.description: events to register information about collateral buy, sell, reinvest and token withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: function to retrieve the token balance of any single address.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: function to purchase collateral by sending any ERC-20 Tokens except Ethereum.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: function to purchase collateral by sending Ethereum.

functionDecorators.name: buyPrice
functionDecorators.description: function to get current purchase price of single collateral.

functionDecorators.name: calculateCollateReceived
functionDecorators.description: function to calculate amount of collateral received after sending tokens.

functionDecorators.name: calculateTokenReceived
functionDecorators.description: function to calculate amount of tokens received after sending collateral.

functionDecorators.name: dividendsOf
functionDecorators.description: function to retrieve the dividend balance of any single address.

functionDecorators.name: myDividends
functionDecorators.description: function to retrieve the dividends owned by the caller.

functionDecorators.name: myTokens
functionDecorators.description: function to retrieve the tokens owned by the caller.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: reinvest
functionDecorators.description: function to convert all dividend to collateral.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: sell
functionDecorators.description: function to sell collatral.

functionDecorators.name: sellAndwithdraw
functionDecorators.description: function to sell collateral and withdraw tokens.

functionDecorators.name: sellPrice
functionDecorators.description: function to get current sell price of single collateral.

functionDecorators.name: startContract
functionDecorators.description: function to startDeposit.

functionDecorators.name: swapTokenContract
functionDecorators.description: function to process swapping of user balance to new token contract address in case project decide to swap ERC-20 token This function will be used only when project team sent equivalent new contract in system token without asking for old tokens token swap ratio must be same this will protect users from price crash due to token sell for swapping.

functionDecorators.name: tokenList
functionDecorators.description: function to return active tokens list in system.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: function to retrieve the total token supply.

functionDecorators.name: totalTokenBalance
functionDecorators.description: function to get tokens contract hold.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: walletList
functionDecorators.description: function to return active wallets list in system.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: function to withdraw tokens, dividend and referralBalance.
